    • Uses of DecimalHolder in org.apache.arrow.vector

      Methods in org.apache.arrow.vector with parameters of type DecimalHolder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DecimalVector.set(int index, DecimalHolder holder)
      Set the element at the given index to the value set in data holder.
      void DecimalVector.setSafe(int index, DecimalHolder holder)
      Same as DecimalVector.set(int, DecimalHolder) except that it handles the case when index is greater than or equal to existing value capacity BaseFixedWidthVector.getValueCapacity().
